author: mcconnell
msg: Update the windows bat files to remove the java extensions directory override and add a generic MERLIN_JVMARGS value.

author: mcconnell
msg: Add listing of the kernel parameters as part of the default behaviour of the merlin servlet.

author: mcconnell
msg: Improve handling of command line args on boolean switches - prev version was setting debug, info, and server modes and in doing so, overriding defaults resolved from properties.  Update changes this so that the explicit declaration of a -info, -debug or -server switch is required before setting the criteria value.

author: mcconnell
msg: Set the default server mode to true.
